name: tm01
effect: Teaches Focus Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Focus Punch Gen II: DynamicPunch Gen I: Mega Punch)

flavor_text.black_white: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
